bibl.title: The Meaning and Function of LhnÒw and Related Features in the Production of Wine. <lenos>
bibl.note: Demonstrates that the lhnÒw in the Egyptian documents has as its basic meaning "a treading / pressing floor or platform". By synecdoche, the lhnÒw was perceived as the entire wine-making complex which included the lhnÒw. <lenos>
MAYERSON Philip, The Meaning and Function of LhnÒw and Related Features in the Production of Wine. <lenos>
